page.shortlink: grid component client side afterrowpopulate event
page.description: Fires after the Javascript grid method that populates a row as fired. Does not fire when a Grid is initialized.
page.discussion: The *[js:afterRowPopulate]* event can be used to set default values in a new record row in a Grid component.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
